description:
Recently the classmate, Karin, has been depressed. Her family business of running an inn hasn’t had many customers and it seems they will go out of business. Yuta and Hikaru wanted to make a homepage for the inn to help market it but for some reason, Karin’s grandmother doesn’t like the internet…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: リョカン@ユキタニテイ
